citation_details.title: Closed-loop control of theta oscillations enhances human hippocampal network connectivity
citation_details.author: JE Kragel, SM Lurie, NP Issa, HA Haider, S Wu
citation_details.abstract: Theta oscillations are implicated in regulating information flow within cortico-hippocampal  networks to support memory and cognition. However, causal evidence tying theta oscillations
citation_details.short_author: JE Kragel, SM Lurie, NP Issa, et al.
